alert.note: Alert for Lower Yukon Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 26 at 8:28PM AKDT until March 27 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow, blowing snow, and freezing rain. Additional snow accumulation up to 3 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility less than one half mile at times. * WHERE...Lower Yukon Valley. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of freezing rain will occur through this evening. Heavy snow will continue into Monday. Winds will diminish overnight.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
